wikipedia_page.main: Bert Hobson (c. 1890 – 1963) was an English footballer who played for Sunderland as a defender. He made his debut for Sunderland on 24 March 1913 in a 3–1 win against Sheffield United at Bramall Lane. He stayed at Roker Park with Sunderland from 1913 to 1922 and made 160 league appearances, with a single goal, although his appearances were halted due to the First World War.
